name: AdanaTalk
_source: s;Adana;You carry yourself with an upright back.|A rare trait, these days.|You wouldn't happen to be of a noble house?
s;Simon;I... am. Lord Simon Verstadt, a pleasure to meet you.
s;Simon;A general? Of Troy, I presume?
s;Adana;Indeed.{w} With me are Squires Emory and Wilheart.
s;Adana;I make this pilgrimage with each new batch of squires.|I believe that the Atropos shrine helps give them perspective.
s;Simon;I see.{w} Have you ever spoken with her?
s;Adana;She is a god, and I am a general, Lord Verstadt.|Though a part of me hopes to see my tapestry,|I know my place.
s;Simon;I understand.{w} Have you ever met someone with her blessing?
s;Adana;Not as far as I know.{w} Though, if I had...|They would be my ally, or I would be dead, I imagine.
s;Simon;Most likely.{w} Well, General Adana, if we meet in the king's court-
s;Adana;Drinks are on me.{w} Take care, Lord Verstadt.
